Package doa.engine.graphics

Lights, sprites, graphics context...
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaAnimation
    Objects of this class are responsible for providing support for sprite based animations.
    DoaAnimations
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Animations for DoaEngine to display.
    DoaFonts
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create Fonts for DoaEngine to use.
    DoaLights
    Responsible for providing a tool to create and set scene lights for DoaEngine.
    DoaSprites
    Responsible for providing a Factory to create sprites for DoaEngine to display.
